languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, знаете ли вы поговорку о бездне, которая может взглянуть в ответ, если смотреть на нее слишком долго? То, о чем вы просите — равносильно тому, чтобы окунуть весь хор в эту самую бездну. Подобный ритуал требует невероятной концентрации от всех его участников. Малейшая неаккуратная мысль, малейший взгляд в неверном направлении — и дорога обратно окажется потеряна. Разумы людей, срастающиеся друг с другом, стекленеющие органы внутри еще живых тел, извращенные фантазии, обретшие плоть... Ужасам варпа ничего не стоит распространиться по всему кораблю в мгновенье ока".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, знаете ли вы поговорку о бездне, которая может взглянуть в ответ, если смотреть на нее слишком долго? То, о чем вы просите — равносильно тому, чтобы окунуть весь хор в эту самую бездну. Подобный ритуал требует невероятной концентрации от всех его участников. Малейшая неаккуратная мысль, малейший взгляд в неверном направлении — и дорога обратно окажется потеряна. Разумы людей, срастающиеся друг с другом, стекленеющие органы внутри еще живых тел, извращенные фантазии, обретшие плоть... Ужасам варпа ничего не стоит распространиться по всему кораблю в мгновенье ока".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, do you know the proverb about staring too long into the abyss? What you are asking for is tantamount to plunging the entire Choir into that abyss. A ritual like that will require incredible focus from each of its participants. It will take a single careless thought, a single glance in the wrong direction, for the way back to be lost. Human minds fusing into one another, vitrified organs inside still-living bodies, perverse fantasies manifesting in the flesh... Nothing will stop the horrors of the warp from spreading all over the ship in the blink of an eye."

Ужасам варпа ничего не стоит распространиться по всему кораблю в мгновенье ока".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, do you know the proverb about the abyss that may stare back if you stare at it too long? What you are asking for is tantamount to plunging the entire choir into that abyss. A ritual like that will require incredible focus from each of its participants. It will take a single careless thought, a single glance in the wrong direction, for the way back to be lost. Human minds fusing into one another; vitrified organs inside still-living bodies; perverse fantasies manifesting in the flesh... Nothing will stop the horrors of the warp from spreading all over the ship in the blink of an eye."

Nothing will stop the horrors of the warp from spreading all over the ship in the blink of an eye."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¿conoce el proverbio sobre observar el abismo? Lo que está pidiendo implicaría lanzar al Coro al completo a ese abismo. Un ritual de ese calado requiere una concentración absoluta de todos y cada uno de los participantes. Un solo pensamiento aislado, una sola mirada en la dirección equivocada y será imposible regresar. Las mentes humanas se fundirán unas con otras, sus órganos se vitrificarán en sus cuerpos aún vivos, unas fantasías perversas se manifestarán físicamente... Nada podrá evitar la propagación de los horrores de la disformidad por toda la nave en un instante».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you know the proverb about staring too long into the abyss? What you are asking for is tantamount to plunging the entire Choir into that abyss. A ritual like that will require incredible focus from each of its participants. It will take a single careless thought, a single glance in the wrong direction, for the way back to be lost. Human minds fusing into one another, vitrified organs inside still-living bodies, perverse fantasies manifesting in the flesh... Nothing will stop the horrors of the warp from spreading all over the ship in the blink of an eye."

Un ritual de ese calado requiere una concentración absoluta de todos y cada uno de los participantes. Un solo pensamiento aislado, una sola mirada en la dirección equivocada y será imposible regresar. Las mentes humanas se fundirán unas con otras, sus órganos se vitrificarán en sus cuerpos aún vivos, unas fantasías perversas se manifestarán físicamente... Nada podrá evitar la propagación de los horrores de la disformidad por toda la nave en un instante».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、『深淵の底を見つめる』ということわざをご存知だろうか？あなたが求めていることは、聖歌隊そのものを深淵の底に突き落とすことに等しい。その手の儀式は、関わる者は誰であっても信じられないほどの集中力を要する。たった一度の不注意、たった一度のよそ見で、戻る道を失うことになる。人間の精神は別の者と融合して、まだ生きている肉体の臓器はガラス化し、歪んだ妄想が肉体に現れる…<歪み>のホラーが瞬く間に船全体に広がるのを止めることはできない」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you know the proverb about staring too long into the abyss? What you are asking for is tantamount to plunging the entire Choir into that abyss. A ritual like that will require incredible focus from each of its participants. It will take a single careless thought, a single glance in the wrong direction, for the way back to be lost. Human minds fusing into one another, vitrified organs inside still-living bodies, perverse fantasies manifesting in the flesh... Nothing will stop the horrors of the warp from spreading all over the ship in the blink of an eye."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、『深淵の底を見つめる』ということわざをご存知だろうか？あなたが求めていることは、聖歌隊そのものを深淵の底に突き落とすことに等しい。その手の儀式は、関わる者は誰であっても信じられないほどの集中力を要する。たった一度の不注意、たった一度のよそ見で、戻る道を失うことになる。人間の精神は別の者と融合して、まだ生きている肉体の臓器はガラス化し、歪んだ妄想が肉体に現れる…<歪み>のホラーが瞬く間に船全体に広がるのを止めることはできない」

languages.text: “当您凝视深渊的时候，深渊也在凝视您。您应该听说过这句谚语吧，舰长大人？这个仪式无异于将整个星语唱诗班推入深渊。它需要每位参与者全神贯注，但凡出现一丝粗心大意，或是走错了方向，就会彻底迷失其中。所有人的思想会融合在一起，所有器官都会变成像玻璃一样的东西，肉体也会发生诡异的扭曲……亚空间的恐怖会在转瞬之间传遍整艘飞船，没有任何东西能够阻止。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you know the proverb about staring too long into the abyss? What you are asking for is tantamount to plunging the entire Choir into that abyss. A ritual like that will require incredible focus from each of its participants. It will take a single careless thought, a single glance in the wrong direction, for the way back to be lost. Human minds fusing into one another, vitrified organs inside still-living bodies, perverse fantasies manifesting in the flesh... Nothing will stop the horrors of the warp from spreading all over the ship in the blink of an eye."

traits.locale_text: “当您凝视深渊的时候，深渊也在凝视您。您应该听说过这句谚语吧，舰长大人？这个仪式无异于将整个星语唱诗班推入深渊。它需要每位参与者全神贯注，但凡出现一丝粗心大意，或是走错了方向，就会彻底迷失其中。所有人的思想会融合在一起，所有器官都会变成像玻璃一样的东西，肉体也会发生诡异的扭曲……亚空间的恐怖会在转瞬之间传遍整艘飞船，没有任何东西能够阻止。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, kennt Ihr die Redewendung, was geschieht, wenn man zu lange in den Abgrund blickt? Was Ihr von mir verlangt, das ist, als würde man den gesamten Chor in diesen Abgrund stürzen. Ein solches Ritual erfordert unglaubliche Konzentration von allen Beteiligten. Schon ein einziger fahrlässiger Gedanke, ein einziger Blick in die falsche Richtung und der Rückweg ist versperrt. Der Verstand mehrerer Menschen, zu einem verschmolzen. Zu Glas verwandelte Organe in noch immer lebenden Körpern, perverse Fantasien, die sich im Fleisch manifestieren ... Nichts wird die Grauen des Warps davon abhalten, sich innerhalb eines Wimpernschlags auf dem gesamten Schiff auszubreiten."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you know the proverb about staring too long into the abyss? What you are asking for is tantamount to plunging the entire Choir into that abyss. A ritual like that will require incredible focus from each of its participants. It will take a single careless thought, a single glance in the wrong direction, for the way back to be lost. Human minds fusing into one another, vitrified organs inside still-living bodies, perverse fantasies manifesting in the flesh... Nothing will stop the horrors of the warp from spreading all over the ship in the blink of an eye."

Nichts wird die Grauen des Warps davon abhalten, sich innerhalb eines Wimpernschlags auf dem gesamten Schiff auszubreiten."

languages.text: « Connaissez-vous le proverbe selon lequel il est dangereux de scruter trop longtemps les abysses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Ce que vous me demandez revient à plonger le chœur tout entier dans des profondeurs dont on revient rarement. Pareil rituel implique une concentration surhumaine de la part de chacun de ses participants. Il suffirait d'une seule seconde d'inattention, d'un seul regard dans la mauvaise direction pour sceller notre perte. Esprits humains fusionnant au hasard, vitrification spontanée d'organes encore vivants, aberrations faites chair... Rien n'empêcherait les horreurs du Warp de se propager à l'ensemble du vaisseau en l'espace d'un clin d'œil. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you know the proverb about staring too long into the abyss? What you are asking for is tantamount to plunging the entire Choir into that abyss. A ritual like that will require incredible focus from each of its participants. It will take a single careless thought, a single glance in the wrong direction, for the way back to be lost. Human minds fusing into one another, vitrified organs inside still-living bodies, perverse fantasies manifesting in the flesh... Nothing will stop the horrors of the warp from spreading all over the ship in the blink of an eye."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, uçuruma uzun süre bakmakla ilgili sözü bilir misiniz? İstediğiniz şey, tüm Koro'yu uçuruma atmakla eş değer. Böylesi bir ayin, her bir katılımcının muazzam derecede odaklanmasını gerektirir. Geri dönüş yolumuzu kaybetmemize tek bir dikkatsiz düşünce, yanlış yöne tek bir bakış yeter. İnsanların zihinleri birbirleriyle kaynaşır, hâlâ yaşayan bedenlerin içindeki organlar cam kesilir, sapkın fanteziler kendini ette sergiler... Öteboyut dehşetlerinin göz açıp kapayana kadar geminin dört bir yanına yayılmasına hiçbir şey mâni olamaz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, do you know the proverb about staring too long into the abyss? What you are asking for is tantamount to plunging the entire Choir into that abyss. A ritual like that will require incredible focus from each of its participants. It will take a single careless thought, a single glance in the wrong direction, for the way back to be lost.
